description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for a Tic Tac Toe Android app. It sets up the UI programmatically, manages game state, handles user interactions, and implements game logic including win/draw detection, UI updates, and reset functionality.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Tic Tac Toe game, responsible for UI setup, game logic, user interactions, and game state management.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and resets game state.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user tapping on a cell, updates game state, checks for win/draw, and updates UI.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status TextView showing current turn or game result.

methods.name: disableAllCellsAfterGameOver
methods.description: Disables user interaction with all cells when the game is over.

methods.name: resetGameWithAnimation
methods.description: Resets the game with a fade-in animation.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Clears the game board, resets game variables, and updates the UI.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if the specified player has a winning combination on the board.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the cells that form a winning line.

methods.name: applyAlpha
methods.description: Applies transparency to a given color based on a specified alpha factor.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels to actual pixels.
